definition: graphic art consisting of an artistic composition made by applying paints to a surface, imagine
details:
noun
- graphic art consisting of an artistic composition made by applying paints to a surface
= synonyms: painting
- a representation of a person or scene in the form of a print or transparent slide
= synonyms: exposure
- a visual representation (of an object or scene or person or abstraction) produced on a surface
= example: a visual representation (of an object or scene or person or abstraction) produced on a surface
= synonyms: image
- a typical example of some state or quality
= example: a typical example of some state or quality
- a clear and telling mental image
= example: a clear and telling mental image
= synonyms: impression
- the visible part of a television transmission
= example: the visible part of a television transmission
= synonyms: video
- a form of entertainment that enacts a story by sound and a sequence of images giving the illusion of continuous movement
= synonyms: film
- illustrations used to decorate or explain a text
= example: illustrations used to decorate or explain a text
= synonyms: pictorial matter
- a graphic or vivid verbal description
= example: a graphic or vivid verbal description
= synonyms: characterization
- a situation treated as an observable object
= example: a situation treated as an observable object
= synonyms: scene
verb
- imagine
= synonyms: figure
- show in, or as in, a picture
= synonyms: show
